name: RAJRAPPA GRAMIN VIKAS SANSTHA
briefDescription: Rajrappa Gramin Vikas Sanstha got registered in 2001 under Society Registration Act.., 1860.  The main activities of RGVS are awareness activities on different issues i.e. education, health, social and cultural through meetings, discussions, organizing competitions, sports events etc.RGVS has implemented projects of Labour Department, DRDA, Tourism Department, Jharkhand Urja Vikas Nigam, Nagar Nigam, Environment, Drinking Water and Sanitation Department etc. Recently organisation is in process to affiliation for skill development training for rural youths.
